posts.postText:
Offender name?: Kenny
Which Server?: TTT

What the Offender did?: Rdm, Trolling
Proof?:
http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044877485859/?tab=public (mass minor rdm+rdm)

http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044877554820/?tab=public , http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044877567384/?tab=public (explosive barrel pushing)

If I may, I'd like to point out this guy was previous banned for severe player disrepect and trolling, and obviously did not learn his lesson... I only wish I had a demo recoding for when he stated over the mic he was a troll, but I only have witnesses, and witnesses dont make proof.
